title: WildFire Monitor Scheme
description: All monitorable values within the WildFire exemplar

constants.description: Constant values which can only be modified between runs.

fixedWind.description: Whether single-direction wind is enabled. False = multi-direction (diagonal) wind.

firstDirection.description: The first direction of two-direction wind

secondDirection.description: The second direction of two-direction wind

firstDirStrength.description: The strength of the wind towards the first direction

windVelocity.description: The speed at which the wind is blowing

simulationDuration.description: The number of steps that the simulation will run for

burningRate.description: The rate at which fire depletes the fuel in a cell

fireSpreadSpeed.description: The speed at which fire spreads to neighboring cells

fuelUpperLimit.description: The maximum amount of fuel which can occur in a cell

fuelBottomLimit.description: The minimum amount of fuel which can occur in a cell

densityProbability.description: The probability of trees occurring in a cell

smokePreDispellingCounter.description: The amount of steps before smoke begins dispelling

observationRadius.description: The radius of the area observable by each UAV drone

securityDistance.description: The radius of the security distance area between drones

dynamicValues.description: Values which change throughout a run of the exemplar

MR1.description: A list of the values of the MR1 adaptation goal, one per UAV drone

MR2.description: The value of the MR2 adaptation goal

uavDetails.description: A list of the relevant details of each UAV drone

items.description: The relevant details of one UAV drone

id.description: The unique ID of the UAV drone agent

x.description: The X coordinate of the drone

y.description: The Y coordinate of the drone

direction.description: The direction that the drone is heading
